title: Partition tales on stage
text:
ï»¿The India-Pakistan Partition has always been a popular topic with theatre artistes, but the play Wo Lahore has a different approach to it.
Written and directed by playwright Atul Satya Koushik, this musical drama which features veteran film actor Avtar Gill in a special appearance, shows the internal conflicts in an ordinary Indian family against the backdrop of the freedom struggle and social beliefs of the Partition.
"The best part about our plays is that they are high on the entertainment quotient. Wo Lahore is a must watch," says Rahul Bhuchar, executive director of The Films and Theatre Society . The play , which will be staged on October 11 at Kamani Auditorium at 7pm, is a part of the ongoing theatre festival, Rang, at Mandi house.
